alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Cobb; Coweta; Douglas; Fayette; Heard; North Fulton; Paulding; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 1:51PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Paulding, northwestern Fayette, southern Cobb, eastern Carroll, Douglas, northeastern Heard, northern Coweta and southwestern Fulton Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 151 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Brownsville to Hannah to near Handy, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Newnan, Douglasville, City of South Fulton, Smyrna, Peachtree City, East Point, Union City, Villa Rica, College Park, Powder Springs, Fairburn, Tyrone, Austell, Palmetto, Hiram, Whitesburg, Lithia Springs, Chattahoochee Hills, and East Newnan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Cobb; Coweta; Douglas; Fayette; Heard; North Fulton; Paulding; South Fulton
